entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
